column5: Without a doubt the greatest country on earth !!  Enjoy the holiday folks
Agreed! Truly an AMAZING Country! All of us are very lucky and should be grateful....mornin Lew.  -Ben
Many of us gripe at the little things but we really are blessed. Happy 143rd Birthday, Canada!
Just want to wish everyone on this board a safe holiday weekend!  Despite controversy, lifejackets DO save lives so put em on!

We really are lucky to be here, aren't we?  Happy Canada Day all. Now get outside and enjoy this beautiful Canadian weather. My good wife has even agreed to join me in the river today so we're heading out shortly.  (Hey. She doesn't like early starts. I'll take what I can get.    )  JF
Hear hear! And a big hand for all those in the military, here and abroad, standing on guard for thee!
happy canada day!! wishing everyone a safe and happy weekend.  tight lines!  alex
Thanks Lew!!! I'm celebrating my 47th Went fishing with my daughter this morning and got a few Happy Canada Day to you too Leechman
The truth could not be clearer, thanks for that Lew, and have yourself a great Canada Day also.
Happy Birthday Canada thanks for being such a great neighbor and creating some of the best people I know.   Art
Happy Canada day right back at Y'all.I might have a bone to pick about the greatest country on earth thing but y'all rock to be sure! Joe
Your right Lew, with all the stuff going on in other country's, this is where I want to be. Thanks Canada

Couldn't help but thinking about what is most Canadian to me yesterday . . . and at the same time I was looking forward to my weeklong getaway starting tomorrow:  A trip to an island in the middle of Georgian Bay to a cottage with my lady, half-a-dozen close friends, beers, fishing, nature, and BBQing.  Then it hit me.  That's one of the most Canadian things any of us can do, and that's just a small part of what Canada means to me.  Best Country in the World.  Our small squabbles are nothing compared to the hardships other nations face.  A beautiful day yesterday with my GF and my Nephew, Bass-ing and taking in fireworks.  It was a great B-Day for Canada!  Cheers
